alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A couple of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Florence, north central Georgetown, west central Horry, south central Marion and northeastern Williamsburg Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 713 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Outland, or 17 miles west of Conway, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Johnsonville, Hemingway, Dongola, Rhems, Outland, Pee Dee Crossroads, Poston, Nesmith, Morrisville, Henry, Kingsburg and Stuckey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg
